message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.  Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only willing to pay $1,600,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I understand your position, I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price.  I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000. This is a good compromise that benefits us both.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I would like to propose a price of $1,625,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
